p:
Considering nuclear encoded genes, it is worthy to note that EDC1 (YGL222C), that is involved in mRNA decapping
32, 33 , is upregulated at 200 min (Supplemental Table S 1). Moreover, ASC1 (YMR116C), that has been described for its involvement in the control and in the fidelity of the mRNA translational activity
34 , is downregulated at 120 and 200 min (Supplemental Table S 1).
